didYouKnow.fact: Shachar designs high-speed PCBs that handle data at 10-25 Gbps - faster than most internet connections!
He can design both a LiDAR sensor AND the Flutter app to control it. Hardware meets software!
Shachar's work spans from 6GHz analog circuits to AI-powered pension platforms - truly multidisciplinary!
He served in the Israeli Armored Corps (NASA 5000) before becoming an engineer.
Shachar has designed systems for major companies including HP, Mobileye, Innoviz, and IAI.
His startup PensionAI was selected for Azure sponsorship at Microsoft!
He managed an 8-engineer integration team at Opsys while still hands-on with PCB design.
Shachar is fluent in both Hebrew (native) and English, and speaks multiple programming languages too!
From multi-layer PCBs to Docker containers - he bridges the physical and digital worlds.
He specializes in Signal & Power Integrity - making sure electrons behave exactly as they should!
Shachar knows how to do carpentry and welding, and swears he won't buy any more furniture.
He was a youth movement counselor and also teaches photons how to move - literally!
Shachar has written thousands of lines of code, but still writes shopping lists by hand.
Not just a CTO - he's also the Chief Tool Organizer in his workshop.
Shachar volunteered with children on the autism spectrum and also made robots understand him.
He builds PCBs, shelves, and coffee corners - not necessarily in that order.
247 cups of coffee consumed this month. Half of them during compilation time.
Average weekly sleep hours: Yes, depends if it's a Sprint or a Deadline.
Builds apps by day - and coffee tables by night.
A project that started as a joke - ended up in actual production. Classic.
